title: Assassins
body: With the new juggernaut patch and the new items that can be bought on pretty much anyone and still do damage, i reckon riot is just saying fuck you to every single assassin and adc. Tanks were bad before but now it is just outrageous.

replies.body:
Assassins' aren't meant to be able to 1 shot a tank, nor are ADCs meant to be killing them in a short amount of time to begin with.

Tanks are meant to be "first in, last out", I don't think there is anything particularly wrong with that. Just get someone to stall the enemy tanks while your team deletes the enemy squishies.
you should try ramus with new items he is so op
good, assassins were strong for seasons 3 and 4, they shouldn't be in the spotlight all the time.
